summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms detailing inmate locations, assignments, and counts for various housing units. The records show Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate in housing unit Z04-206LAD, assigned to an attorney visit (ATTY) and listed as 'UNASSG' for work detail.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative counts and assignment tracking of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including out-counts for inmates away from their housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein was housed in unit Z04-206LAD and was listed with an assignment category of ATTY (attorney), indicating he had or was scheduled for a legal visit.
The documents show standard prison administrative procedures, including inmate counts, rosters, and out-count forms for tracking inmate movement.
Several other inmates are listed with notes indicating 'SUICIDE OR', which may refer to suicide observation or risk status.
The records provide a snapshot of prison operations on a specific date shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
